key_risks: Intense competition from larger players like Microsoft and Google
Profitability concerns due to high operating costs and customer acquisition expenses
Data security and privacy risks, including compliance with GDPR and CCPA
Customer concentration risk with significant revenue from large enterprise clients
Fraud and billing issues, including recent complaints of fraudulent charges
controversies: Fraudulent charges on customer credit cards
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability goals, including achieving carbon neutrality
social_issues: Proactive stance on GDPR and data privacy regulations
governance_issues: High customer concentration viewed as a risk factor by investors and acquirers
